tool_description: APIs that summarize news and social media data into trading signals
name: Cryptocurrency News and Social Media indices
title: Cryptocurrency News and Social Media indices
tool_name: Cryptocurrency News and Social Media indices

api_list.name: Get data
api_list.description: Get data using filters like signal, token and datetime.

api_list.name: Get token & signals list
api_list.description: Gets a list of supported tickers along with available signals for each token.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news-and-social-media-indices.p.rapidapi.com/signals/tickerInfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news-and-social-media-indices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-news-and-social-media-indices.p.rapidapi.com/signals/tickerInfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-news-and-social-media-indices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
